short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An open-source Chrome extension to interact with UTXORD.com marketplace

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UTXORD.com is an online marketplace for Bitcoin inscriptions. This wallet allows uses to interact with the marketplace: setup accounts, create and trade inscriptions, and store keys.

Features:
Non-custodial
No tracking of personal data
BIP32/39/44 key generation/derivation from a seed phrase.
also works with user’s own private/public key pairs and seed phrases
Open source
(Repository: https://github.com/UTXORD/utxord-wallet)
Wallet does not store user’s seed phrases, passwords or other private info. Private keys are saved locally, encrypted by user’s password, and are never shared with the marketplace.

For more information, visit https://utxord.com
